gold.name: Pure Protection Newborn Diapers
gold.description: Plant-based liners with no chlorine bleaching, fragrances, or parabens. Exceptional softness and up to 12-hour leak protection make these the clear choice for sensitive newborn skin.

silver.name: Natural Care Sensitive Diapers
silver.description: Triple-layer absorbency with a dermatologist-tested, hypoallergenic inner liner. Reliable fit with a wetness indicator stripe — a solid all-rounder at an accessible price point.

gold.name: Daily Moisture Baby Lotion
gold.description: Colloidal oatmeal formula clinically shown to improve skin moisture in 24 hours. Fragrance-free, steroid-free, and gentle enough for eczema-prone skin from day one.

silver.name: Baby Moisturising Lotion
silver.description: Developed with dermatologists, this lotion delivers three essential ceramides and hyaluronic acid to strengthen the skin barrier. Fragrance-free and non-comedogenic.

gold.name: Vista V3 Pram System
gold.description: An industry-leading convertible pram that grows from single to double with no extra adapters. The all-day suspension, oversized bassinet, and intuitive fold make it the benchmark for new parents.

silver.name: Fox 5 Pushchair
silver.description: Featherlight self-standing fold, all-wheel suspension, and a reversible seat that lasts from newborn to toddler. Exceptional off-road performance with a refined urban aesthetic.

gold.name: Easy Start Anti-Colic Bottle
gold.description: Award-winning self-sterilising bottle with a patented vented base that reduces colic symptoms by 80%. The flat, ultra-thin teat is accepted by 94% of breastfed babies in independent trials.

silver.name: Natural Response Baby Bottle
silver.description: Responsive flow nipple lets babies control the flow of milk, mirroring breastfeeding. Wide neck for easy cleaning, BPA-free construction, and compatible with Philips breast pumps.

gold.name: Pro Smart Baby Monitor
gold.description: Crystal-clear 1080p overhead camera with computer-vision sleep tracking and breathing motion monitoring. The app provides actionable insights on sleep patterns without wearables.

silver.name: Halo+ Overhead Video Monitor
silver.description: Motorised rotating lens gives a full overhead view plus a 360° pan. Built-in projector, two-way audio, and room temperature sensor in one sleek over-the-crib unit.

gold.name: Explore & More Activity Gym
gold.description: Folds flat in seconds and converts to a take-along play mat. Multi-stage play encourages tummy time, reaching, and sitting, with age-appropriate toys that attach to any of the three arches.

silver.name: Smooth Moves Sloth Linkimal
silver.description: Interactive plush with lights, music, and motion that syncs with other Linkimals toys. Introduces early concepts like colours and counting through cause-and-effect play from 9 months.
